mapper.select: SELECT tb.no_seq as seq, tb.no_user_num as user_num, tb.no_subject as subject, date_format(tb.no_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff( now(), tb.no_date ) wgap, user_nickname, tb.rowno as rowno FROM (SELECT no_seq, no_user_num, no_subject, no_date, row_number() over( ORDER BY (case when no_subject like '%리뷰%' then 1 when no_subject like '%챌린지%' then 2 when no_subject like '%공유%' then 3 else 4 end), no_seq desc ) rowno FROM notice_board ) as tb INNER JOIN user u ON tb.no_user_num = u.user_num ORDER BY tb.rowno LIMIT #{skip}, #{recordPerPage}

SELECT tb.no_seq as seq, tb.no_user_num as user_num, tb.no_subject as subject, tb.no_content as content, date_format(tb.no_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, tb.rowno as rowno FROM (SELECT no_seq, no_user_num, no_subject, no_content, no_date, row_number() over( ORDER BY (case when no_subject like '%리뷰%' then 1 when no_subject like '%챌린지%' then 2 when no_subject like '%공유%' then 3 else 4 end), no_seq desc ) rowno FROM notice_board ) as tb WHERE tb.no_seq = #{seq}

SELECT tb.no_seq as seq, tb.no_subject as subject, tb.rowno as rowno FROM (SELECT no_seq, no_subject, row_number() over( ORDER BY (case when no_subject like '%리뷰%' then 1 when no_subject like '%챌린지%' then 2 when no_subject like '%공유%' then 3 else 4 end), no_seq desc ) rowno FROM notice_board ) as tb WHERE tb.rowno = #{rowno} + 1

SELECT tb.no_seq as seq, tb.no_subject as subject, tb.rowno as rowno FROM (SELECT no_seq, no_subject, row_number() over( ORDER BY (case when no_subject like '%리뷰%' then 1 when no_subject like '%챌린지%' then 2 when no_subject like '%공유%' then 3 else 4 end), no_seq desc ) rowno FROM notice_board ) as tb WHERE tb.rowno = #{rowno} - 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board ( no_seq, no_user_num, no_subject, no_content, no_date ) VALUES ( 0, #{user_num}, #{subject}, #{content}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT no_seq as seq, no_user_num as user_num, no_subject as subject, no_content as content, no_date as wdate FROM notice_board WHERE no_seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET no_subject = #{subject}, no_content = #{content} WHERE no_seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT tb.no_seq as seq, tb.no_user_num as user_num, tb.no_subject as subject, date_format(tb.no_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff( now(), tb.no_date ) wgap, user_nickname, tb.rowno as rowno FROM (SELECT no_seq, no_user_num, no_subject, no_date, row_number() over( ORDER BY (case when no_subject like '%리뷰%' then 1 when no_subject like '%챌린지%' then 2 when no_subject like '%공유%' then 3 else 4 end), no_seq desc ) rowno FROM notice_board ) as tb INNER JOIN user u ON tb.no_user_num = u.user_num ORDER BY tb.rowno LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT date_format(at_login, '%Y.%m.%d') as date, count(*) as cnt FROM attendance WHERE date_format(at_login, '%Y.%m.%d') > last_day( curdate() - interval 1 month) AND date_format(at_login, '%Y.%m.%d') <= curdate() GROUP BY date

SELECT sub.start, sub.end, sub.date, sub.cnt FROM ( SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(at_login, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(at_login)-2) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d') as start, date_format(DATE_SUB(at_login, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(at_login)-8) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d') as end, date_format(at_login, '%Y.%V') as date, count(*) as cnt FROM attendance WHERE date_format(at_login, '%Y') = date_format(now(), '%Y') GROUP BY date desc LIMIT 0, 10 ) as sub ORDER BY date asc
SELECT date_format(at_login, '%Y.%m') as date, count(*) as cnt FROM attendance WHERE date_format(at_login, '%Y') = date_format(now(), '%Y') GROUP BY date
